title: Block Liquidity Access_
description: Block Liquidity Access minimizes the market impact and execution cost for both buyers and sellers. Our OTC desk offers clients with bespoke high-touch services through voice trading and messengers. Clients can receive quotes 24/7 for large block trade orders for major cryptocurrencies, fiat on-ramps and off-ramps, and derivatives that use a credit line and flexible settlement schedules.

left_data.title: Instantly trade from small to multi-million dollar blocks
left_data.desc: We have traded tens of billions in cryptocurrency since 2015, ranging from small algo trades to multi-million dollar blocks.

left_data.title: 24/7 Liquidity, Streaming prices, zero fees
left_data.desc: The OTC desk provides global coverage in the Americas, Europe and Asia-Pacific and is open 24/7, with the exception of major holidays.

left_data.title: Post-trade settlement
left_data.desc: A secure, stable, and seamless settlement workflow. We provide the post-trade, weekend, and flexible settlement solutions institutional traders expect.

top.title: Supported Assets
top.desc: In addition to OTC bitcoin trading, the Kraken OTC desk can support all fiat currencies and digital assets currencies listed on the Kraken Exchange:
